Abathur.name: Symbiote
Abathur.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

Abathur.name: Toxic Nest
Abathur.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
Abathur.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

Abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
Abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Abathur.name: Locust Strain
Abathur.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 316 (+4% per level) health and deal 46 (+4% per level) damage with each Basic Attack.

Abathur.name: Deep Tunnel
Abathur.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

AbathurSymbiote.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shields the assisted ally for 150 (+4% per level). Allied Heroes are healed for 22 (+4% per level) Health per second while the Shield is active. Lasts for 6 seconds.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Stab
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbiote.description: Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Deep Tunnel
AbathurSymbiote.description: Order your Evolved Monstrosity to quickly tunnel to a visible location

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

1.name: Reinforced Carapace
1.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

4.name: Needlespine
4.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

Alarak.name: Discord Strike
Alarak.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

Alarak.name: Telekinesis
Alarak.description: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

Alarak.name: Lightning Surge
Alarak.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

Alarak.name: Deadly Charge
Alarak.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

Alarak.name: Counter-Strike
Alarak.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

Alarak.name: Sadism
Alarak.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 75% Health.

1.name: Sustaining Power
1.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 65 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

20.name: Deadly Charge
20.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

Alexstrasza.name: Gift of Life
Alexstrasza.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount.  Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

Alexstrasza.name: Abundance
Alexstrasza.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.  Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.

Alexstrasza.name: Flame Buffet
Alexstrasza.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 (+4% per level) damage over 5.5 seconds.  Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.  Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

Alexstrasza.name: Life-Binder
Alexstrasza.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

Alexstrasza.name: Cleansing Flame
Alexstrasza.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

Alexstrasza.name: Dragonqueen
Alexstrasza.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 (+4% per level) Health.  While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 (+4% per level) damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 (+4% per level) in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 15 seconds.

AlexstraszaDragon.name: Breath of Life
AlexstraszaDragon.description: Heal an allied Hero for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

AlexstraszaDragon.name: Preservation
AlexstraszaDragon.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

AlexstraszaDragon.name: Wing Buffet
AlexstraszaDragon.description: Deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

AlexstraszaDragon.name: Dragonqueen
AlexstraszaDragon.description: Alexstrasza has transformed into a powerful dragon aspect, gaining 500 (+4% per level) Health, resistance to disabling effects, and empowered Basic Attacks and Abilities.

AlexstraszaDragon.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaDragon.description: Take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.description: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.description: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

4.name: Exuberance
4.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.description: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love
16.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.name: Overprotective
16.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

16.name: Draconic Discipline
16.description: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

20.name: Ritual of Life
20.description: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

20.name: On Ruby Wings
20.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

20.name: Ancient Flame
20.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 25%.

20.name: Blessing of the Red
20.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

Ana.name: Healing Dart
Ana.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 195 (+4% per level) Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

Ana.name: Biotic Grenade
Ana.description: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 152 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

Ana.name: Sleep Dart
Ana.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds.  Cannot be used on Vehicles.

Ana.name: Nano Boost
Ana.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

Ana.name: Eye of Horus
Ana.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

Ana.name: Shrike
Ana.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times. Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Shrike.  Aim Down Sights  Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by 25%, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by 25% while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.

1.name: Contact Healing
1.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

1.name: Slumber Shells
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by 4 seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Rounds
1.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.  Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.  Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.

4.name: Biotic Enhancements
4.description: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Overdose
4.description: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

4.name: Debilitating Dart
4.description: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Anti-Healer
7.description: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 25%.

7.name: Night Terrors
7.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds for every Hero hit by Sleeping Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 10% of their Maximum Health in damage.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Active Reload
16.description: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Deadeye
20.description: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

20.name: Armored Stance
20.description: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Dynamic Optics
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.

Anduin.name: Flash Heal
Anduin.description: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 260 (+4% per level).

Anduin.name: Divine Star
Anduin.description: Send light that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 (+4% per level) in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.

Anduin.name: Chastise
Anduin.description: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 145 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.

Anduin.name: Holy Word: Salvation
Anduin.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

Anduin.name: Lightbomb
Anduin.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Anduin.name: Leap of Faith
Anduin.description: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

1.name: Renew
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.

1.name: Pursued by Grace
1.description: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 33 (+4% per level).

1.name: Bold Strategy
1.description: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Moral Compass
4.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

4.name: Holy Reach
4.description: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has 50% more range, 75% more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for 100 (+4% per level).

4.name: Inner Fire
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

7.name: Binding Heal
7.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 104 (+4% per level).

7.name: Power Word: Shield
7.description: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.

13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.

13.name: Push Forward!
13.description: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.

16.name: Evenhanded Blessings
16.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund 50% of its cooldown.

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

16.name: Lightwell
16.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to 30% of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Glyph of Faith
20.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

20.name: Varian's Legacy
20.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

20.name: Desperate Prayer
20.description: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.  Using Desperate Prayer places Flash Heal on a 10 second cooldown.

Anubarak.name: Impale
Anubarak.description: Deals 90 (+4% per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

Anubarak.name: Harden Carapace
Anubarak.description: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 315 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Burrow Charge
Anubarak.description: Burrow to the target location, dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.  Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

Anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
Anubarak.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Cocoon
Anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

Anubarak.name: Scarab Host
Anubarak.description: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: Nerubian Armor
1.description: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.

1.name: Legion of Beetles
1.description: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
4.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Subterranean Shield
7.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

16.name: Debilitation
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+4% per level) health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Artanis.name: Blade Dash
Artanis.description: Dash forward and deal 57 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+4% per level) damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

Artanis.name: Twin Blades
Artanis.description: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

Artanis.name: Phase Prism
Artanis.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+4% per level) damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

Artanis.name: Purifier Beam
Artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Suppression Pulse
Artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Shield Overload
Artanis.description: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 375 (+4% per level) Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description: Using Twin Blades grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Warp Sickness
7.description: Phase Prism also Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 50 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.name: Force of Will
16.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.name: Blades of a Templar
16.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 14%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge
20.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

20.name: Plasma Burn
20.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

Arthas.name: Death Coil
Arthas.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage to target enemy.  Can be self-cast to heal for 262 (+4% per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Howling Blast
Arthas.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+4% per level) damage.

Arthas.name: Frozen Tempest
Arthas.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.

Arthas.name: Army of the Dead
Arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Summon Sindragosa
Arthas.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

Arthas.name: Frostmourne Hungers
Arthas.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately and deal 99 (+4% per level) increased damage. Dealing damage restores 30 Mana.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

Auriel.name: Sacred Sweep
Auriel.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 45 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies caught in the center.

Auriel.name: Ray of Heaven
Auriel.description: Consume Auriel's stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

Auriel.name: Detainment Strike
Auriel.description: Deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage.

Auriel.name: Resurrect
Auriel.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

Auriel.name: Crystal Aegis
Auriel.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

Auriel.name: Bestow Hope
Auriel.description: Passive: 60% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 20% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy.  Bestow an allied Hero with Hope.  While they remain near Auriel, 30% of their damage to Heroes and 10% of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  Auriel can store up to 475 (+4% per level) energy.

1.name: Swift Sweep
1.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.name: Increasing Clarity
1.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

1.name: Righteous Assault
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

1.name: Searing Light
1.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

4.name: Majestic Span
4.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

4.name: Heavy Burden
4.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 50% for 3 seconds after the stun.

4.name: Repeated Offense
4.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.name: Glimmer of Hope
7.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.name: Empathic Link
7.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

7.name: Energized Cord
7.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.name: Resurrect
10.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

10.name: Crystal Aegis
10.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

13.name: Blinding Flash
13.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

13.name: Converging Force
13.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.name: Piercing Lash
13.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Reservoir of Hope
16.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.name: Will of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

16.name: Wrath of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.name: Light Speed
20.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.name: Diamond Resolve
20.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

20.name: Angelic Flight
20.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

20.name: Shield of Hope
20.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

Azmodan.name: Globe of Annihilation
Azmodan.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 184 (+2.5% per level) damage on impact.  Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation.  Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases the damage of Globe of Annihilation by 1, up to 400.

Azmodan.name: Summon Demon Warrior
Azmodan.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches forward. Warriors deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per Attack and 16 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

Azmodan.name: All Shall Burn
Azmodan.description: Channel a beam of death on an enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second for 2.5 seconds. If the Channel lasts its full duration, deal an extra 320 (+4% per level) damage to the target.  Azmodan's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% while Channeling.

Azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
Azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

Azmodan.name: Tide of Sin
Azmodan.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

Azmodan.name: Demon Lieutenant
Azmodan.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every 7 seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. Lasts 20 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

1.name: Greed
1.description: Globe of Annihilation deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, increase the range of All Shall Burn by 25% and Demon Warriors gain 20% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

1.name: Gluttony
1.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

1.name: Wrath
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

4.name: Hellforged Armor
4.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

4.name: Battleborn
4.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Art of Chaos
7.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 40 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

7.name: Bombardment
7.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

7.name: Master of Destruction
7.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 3 Annihilation per Hero hit.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

10.name: Tide of Sin
10.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

13.name: Brutish Vanguard
13.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
13.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Chain of Command
13.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

16.name: Total Annihilation
16.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Hell Rift
16.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

16.name: Sin's Grasp
16.description: All Shall Burn Slows the enemy target by 15% during its Channel. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%, and the enemy is Slowed by 45% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Siegebreaker
20.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

20.name: Black Pool
20.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second.

20.name: Pride
20.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.

20.name: Trample
20.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

Blaze.name: Flame Stream
Blaze.description: Fire two streams that deal 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

Blaze.name: Oil Spill
Blaze.description: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 50%.  Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 16 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 (+4% per level) Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Blaze.name: Jet Propulsion
Blaze.description: After 0.375 seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals 52 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

Blaze.name: Bunker Drop
Blaze.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

Blaze.name: Combustion
Blaze.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

Blaze.name: Pyromania
Blaze.description: Gain 40 Armor and deal 40 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.  Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by 5 seconds.

1.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

1.name: Endurance Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 480 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

1.name: Neural Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 30 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

1.name: New Habits
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.name: Adhesive Petroleum
4.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Oil Dispersal
4.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%.  Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 1 second and refunds 5 Mana.

4.name: Meltdown
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 7% for 2.5 seconds, up to 35%.

7.name: Crossfire
7.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

7.name: Grill and Kill
7.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

7.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
7.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

10.name: Combustion
10.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

13.name: Suppressive Fire
13.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.

13.name: Nanomachine Coating
13.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Fuel Leak
13.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

16.name: Thermal Protection
16.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Heat Treatment
16.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

16.name: Juggernaut Plating
16.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

20.name: Fortified Bunker
20.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

20.name: Flash Fire
20.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.

20.name: Burn Notice
20.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Brightwing.name: Arcane Flare
Brightwing.description: Shoot a flare dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

Brightwing.name: Polymorph
Brightwing.description: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

Brightwing.name: Pixie Dust
Brightwing.description: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

Brightwing.name: Blink Heal
Brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

Brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
Brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

Brightwing.name: Soothing Mist
Brightwing.description: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds

Brightwing.name: Phase Shift
Brightwing.description: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 20% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Greater Polymorph
1.description: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

4.name: Dream Shot
4.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Magic Spit
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Flare
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.name: Peekaboo!
7.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.name: Critical Mist
7.description: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250 (+4% per level).

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.name: Safety Dust
13.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

13.name: Pixie Power
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.name: Hush!
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Phase Out
16.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Invisible Friends
20.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

20.name: Intensive Winds
20.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

20.name: Speedy Dragon
20.description: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed.

20.name: Faerie Protector
20.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

Cassia.name: Lightning Fury
Cassia.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

Cassia.name: Blinding Light
Cassia.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.  Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

Cassia.name: Fend
Cassia.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

Cassia.name: Ball Lightning
Cassia.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

Cassia.name: Valkyrie
Cassia.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

Cassia.name: Avoidance
Cassia.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

1.name: Seraph's Hymn
1.description: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown.  Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active.  Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second.  Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

7.name: Impale
7.description: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

7.name: War Traveler
7.description: Cassia gains 8% Movement Speed every 1 second while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.description: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Grounding Bolt
13.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Lunging Strike
13.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Pierce
16.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

16.name: Penetrate
16.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

Chen.name: Flying Kick
Chen.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage.

Chen.name: Keg Smash
Chen.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and soak enemies in Brew for 3 seconds, Slowing them by 10%. After 1.25 seconds, the Slow is increased to 40%.  After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire.  Breath of Fire Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.

Chen.name: Stagger
Chen.description: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented.  Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds.  This damage cannot be modified.

Chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
Chen.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

Chen.name: Wandering Keg
Chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Chen.name: Fortifying Brew
Chen.description: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining 50 Brew and 180 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 540 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 4 seconds after he stops drinking.

Chen.name: Breath of Fire
Chen.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 85 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies that are soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 165 (+4% per level) additional damage over 3 seconds and adding 1.5 seconds to the duration of the Slow from Keg Smash.   After being used or after 6 seconds, this ability becomes Keg Smash.  Keg Smash Damage and Slow enemies.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Storm
ChenStormEarthFire.description: The spirits gain a Shield for 400 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the shield amount is increased to 750 (+4% per level) with no limited duration, and the duration of Storm, Earth, Fire is increased by 5 seconds.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Earth
ChenStormEarthFire.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, dealing 32 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, increase the damage dealt by 300% and instead of Slowing, the leap Roots enemy Heroes hit for 1.75 seconds.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Fire
ChenStormEarthFire.description: Increase the Attack Speed and Basic Attack damage of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the Attack Speed and damage bonus is increased to 75% and the spirits gain 50% Movement Speed for its duration.

1.name: Eye of the Tiger
1.description: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 100%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
1.description: Chen heals for 3% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Accumulating Flame
4.description: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Withering Flames
4.description: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Gift of the Ox
7.description: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1 second, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Elusive Brawler
7.description: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 15% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Ring of Fire
13.description: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

13.name: Enough to Share
13.description: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

16.name: Flying Leap
16.description: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

16.name: Celerity
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

16.name: Combo Strikes
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

20.name: Purifying Brew
20.description: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Energizing Brew
20.description: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.

Chogall.name: Surging Fist
Chogall.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

Chogall.name: Consuming Blaze
Chogall.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

Chogall.name: Rune Bomb
Chogall.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

Chogall.name: Upheaval
Chogall.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

Chogall.name: Hammer of Twilight
Chogall.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

Chogall.name: Ogre Hide
Chogall.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

1.name: Consuming Fire
1.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

1.name: Fuel for the Flame
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.  Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

1.name: Calloused Hide
1.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

7.name: Firestarter
7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.name: Enraged Regeneration
7.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Surging Dash
13.description: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

13.name: Twilight Veil
13.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 100% for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

13.name: Molten Block
13.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

16.name: Frenzied Fists
16.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

16.name: Runic Feedback
16.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Runed Gauntlet
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 5%.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: The Will of Cho
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

20.name: Hour of Twilight
20.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

Chromie.name: Sand Blast
Chromie.description: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 40% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.

Chromie.name: Dragon's Breath
Chromie.description: Vector Targeting Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing 204 (+4% per level) damage each.

Chromie.name: Time Trap
Chromie.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.

Chromie.name: Temporal Loop
Chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

Chromie.name: Slowing Sands
Chromie.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

Chromie.name: Timewalker
Chromie.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Detonate Time Trap  Detonates active Time Traps.

1.name: Once Again the First Time
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.
