1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 75.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 75 and also increase Chromie's vision radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 15% Spell Power.

4.name: Chronic Conditions
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Time Troubles
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
4.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

7.name: Bronze Talons
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast grants 40% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Dragon's Breath reduces its cooldown by 1.75 seconds and restores 40 Mana.

7.name: A Proper Greeting
7.description: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
13.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Unravelling
20.description: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 5 up to 30.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast now pierces all enemies hit.

20.name: Blessing of the Bronze
20.description: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 8 seconds.

Deckard.name: Healing Potion
Deckard.description: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 270 (+4% per level).  Limit 5 active Potions.

Deckard.name: Horadric Cube
Deckard.description: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.

Deckard.name: Scroll Of Sealing
Deckard.description: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

Deckard.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
Deckard.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

Deckard.name: Lorenado
Deckard.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

Deckard.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
Deckard.description: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

1.name: Field Study
1.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

1.name: Sapphire
1.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
4.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Ruby
4.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100%  and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Emerald
7.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

13.name: Potion of Revival
13.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to 5 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Drag
Dehaka.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds.  If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

Dehaka.name: Dark Swarm
Dehaka.description: Deal 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

Dehaka.name: Burrow
Dehaka.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Isolation
Dehaka.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Adaptation
Dehaka.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

Dehaka.name: Essence Collection
Dehaka.description: Heal Dehaka for 29 (+4% per level) Health per stored Essence over 5 seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.  Passive: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of 50 Essence.

Dehaka.name: Brushstalker
Dehaka.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.  Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

1.name: Enduring Swarm
1.description: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

1.name: Tissue Regeneration
1.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

1.name: Enhanced Agility
1.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

4.name: Lurker Strain
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 4 seconds.  Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

4.name: One-Who-Collects
4.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

4.name: Hero Stalker
4.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

7.name: Feeding Frenzy
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Constriction
7.description: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Symbiosis
7.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

10.name: Isolation
10.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

10.name: Adaptation
10.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

13.name: Primal Rage
13.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

13.name: Ferocious Stalker
13.description: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

13.name: Primal Swarm
13.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

16.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
16.description: Drag Slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

16.name: Elongated Tongue
16.description: Increase Drag range by 20%.

16.name: Tunneling Claws
16.description: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

20.name: Contagion
20.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

20.name: Change Is Survival
20.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apex Predator
20.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 35 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Essence Claws
20.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

Diablo.name: Shadow Charge
Diablo.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 120 (+4% per level) damage.

Diablo.name: Fire Stomp
Diablo.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 (+4% per level) damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

Diablo.name: Overpower
Diablo.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

Diablo.name: Apocalypse
Diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Diablo.name: Lightning Breath
Diablo.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

Diablo.name: Black Soulstone
Diablo.description: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains 35 Mana.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

DVa.name: Boosters
DVa.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked away.  D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

DVa.name: Defense Matrix
DVa.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.  Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

DVa.name: Self-Destruct
DVa.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 1200 (+4% per level) to 400 (+4% per level) damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures.  Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

DVa.name: Big Shot
DVa.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

DVa.name: Bunny Hop
DVa.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

DVa.name: Mech Mode
DVa.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

DVa.name: Mechanized Walker
DVa.description: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base Movement Speed is reduced by 15%.

D.VaPilot.name: Call Mech
D.VaPilot.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode.  Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.

D.VaPilot.name: Pilot Mode
D.VaPilot.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

D.VaPilot.name: Torpedo Dash
D.VaPilot.description: Dash towards the target location, passing through enemies along the way.

D.VaPilot.name: Concussive Pulse
D.VaPilot.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.

D.VaPilot.name: Call Mech
D.VaPilot.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode.  Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.

1.name: Rush-down
1.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

1.name: Hit the Nitrous
1.description: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

1.name: Crash Course
1.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

4.name: Diverting Power
4.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.

4.name: Get Through This!
4.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

4.name: Fusion Generator
4.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

4.name: Bring It On
4.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through
7.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.name: Dazer Zone
7.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.name: Aggression Matrix
7.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Nuclear Option
7.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash
16.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
16.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit
16.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

ETC.name: Powerslide
ETC.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

ETC.name: Face Melt
ETC.description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

ETC.name: Guitar Solo
ETC.description: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Mosh Pit
ETC.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Stage Dive
ETC.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

ETC.name: Rockstar
ETC.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 60% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.25 seconds.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.description: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Falstad.name: Hammerang
Falstad.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 121 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

Falstad.name: Lightning Rod
Falstad.description: Deal 107 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target.

Falstad.name: Barrel Roll
Falstad.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

Falstad.name: Mighty Gust
Falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
Falstad.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

Falstad.name: Tailwind
Falstad.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

Falstad.name: Flight
Falstad.description: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Each time a Hero is hit by Hammerang, its damage is permanently increased by 1.5 and it refunds 10 Mana.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

1.name: Wingman
1.description: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum of 80 stacks.  Passive: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 60%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 80% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.description: Increases Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 60%.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 40 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

Fenix.name: Plasma Cutter
Fenix.description: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.

Fenix.name: Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon
Fenix.description: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.  Activate to change to Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb, increasing Basic Attack range and damage, and causing Basic Attacks to splash.

Fenix.name: Warp
Fenix.description: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.

Fenix.name: Planet Cracker
Fenix.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

Fenix.name: Purification Salvo
Fenix.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

Fenix.name: Shield Capacitor
Fenix.description: Fenix has a permanent 760 (+4% per level) Shield which regenerates at 10% per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

FenixPhaseBomb.name: Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb
FenixPhaseBomb.description: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.  Activate to change to Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon, increasing Basic Attack speed.

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 3 seconds. Does not spread from Inhibiting Energy's Slow.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Gall.name: Shadowflame
Gall.description: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

Gall.name: Dread Orb
Gall.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 126 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

Gall.name: Runic Blast
Gall.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage around it.

Gall.name: Twisting Nether
Gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

Gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
Gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

Gall.name: Ogre Rage
Gall.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's Armor by 25.  Passive: Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.

Gall.name: Shove
Gall.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Gall.name: Eye of Kilrogg
Gall.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Keep Moving!
1.description: Increases the duration of Shove's Movement Speed bonus by 2 seconds.

1.name: Taskmaster
1.description: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

1.name: We See You!
1.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

4.name: Double Back
4.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 50% more damage to Heroic targets, and 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

4.name: Runic Persistence
4.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

4.name: Bomb's Away
4.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Ogre Rampage
7.description: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by 5%. Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
10.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.name: Twisting Nether
10.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Searing Shadows
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

13.name: Rising Dread
13.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

13.name: Twilight Nova
13.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.name: Shadowsnare
16.description: Shadowflame Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

16.name: Leaden Orb
16.description: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Deafening Blast
16.description: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Shadowfury
20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: Shifting Nether
20.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.

20.name: The Will of Gall
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

20.name: Psychotic Break
20.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Groundbreaker
Garrosh.description: Deal 81 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.5 seconds and then Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Bloodthirst
Garrosh.description: Deal 156 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

Garrosh.name: Wrecking Ball
Garrosh.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Warlord's Challenge
Garrosh.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Decimate
Garrosh.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Garrosh.name: Armor Up
Garrosh.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Body Check
1.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.

4.name: In For the Kill
4.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

4.name: Indomitable
4.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Oppressor
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Into the Fray
7.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.description: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Rough Landing
16.description: Increase Groundbreaker's Slow amount by 10% and duration by 1 second.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

Gazlowe.name: Rock-It! Turret
Gazlowe.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Gazlowe.name: Deth Lazor
Gazlowe.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.  Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

Gazlowe.name: Xplodium Charge
Gazlowe.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Gazlowe.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
Gazlowe.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

Gazlowe.name: Robo-Goblin
Gazlowe.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

Gazlowe.name: Salvager
Gazlowe.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds.  Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

Gazlowe.name: Focus Turrets!
Gazlowe.description: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
1.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

1.name: Break it Down!
1.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

1.name: Goblin Repairs
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
4.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

4.name: ARK Reaktor
4.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
4.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

4.name: Hired Goons
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
7.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

7.name: Engine Gunk
7.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks Slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Hyperfocus Coils
7.description: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
13.description: Deth Lazor Slows Heroes by 50% and Stuns non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: Goblin Fusion
13.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
13.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

16.name: Turret Storage
16.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

16.name: Superior Schematics
16.description: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

16.name: Kwik Release Charge
16.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

20.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
20.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

Genji.name: Shuriken
Genji.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Stores up to 3 charges.  Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Genji.name: Deflect
Genji.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.  Total Damage Deflected: 0

Genji.name: Swift Strike
Genji.description: Dash forward, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

Genji.name: Dragonblade
Genji.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

Genji.name: X-Strike
Genji.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

Genji.name: Cyber Agility
Genji.description: Activate to jump to the target area.

1.name: Swift as the Wind
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Agile Dismount
1.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

1.name: Pathfinder
1.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

4.name: Shuriken Mastery
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

4.name: Strike At The Heart
4.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

7.name: Augmented Guard
7.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

7.name: Perfect Defense
7.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

7.name: Cyber Shield
7.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Dodge
7.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

10.name: Dragonblade
10.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: X-Strike
10.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

13.name: Shingan
13.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

13.name: Flow Like Water
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Jump
13.description: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges.

16.name: Reflect
16.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

16.name: Final Cut
16.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

16.name: Steady Blade
16.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
20.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If a Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

20.name: Living Weapon
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: Sharpened Stars
20.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: Zanshin
20.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

Greymane.name: Gilnean Cocktail
Greymane.description: Hurl a flask that deals 55 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.  Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

Greymane.name: Inner Beast
Greymane.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

Greymane.name: Darkflight
Greymane.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage.  Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

Greymane.name: Go for the Throat
Greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

Greymane.name: Cursed Bullet
Greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

Greymane.name: Curse of the Worgen
Greymane.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.  While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

GreymaneWorgenForm.name: Razor Swipe
GreymaneWorgenForm.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

GreymaneWorgenForm.name: Inner Beast
GreymaneWorgenForm.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

GreymaneWorgenForm.name: Disengage
GreymaneWorgenForm.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.  Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.description: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

Guldan.name: Fel Flame
Guldan.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

Guldan.name: Drain Life
Guldan.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 (+4% per level) Health per second.

Guldan.name: Corruption
Guldan.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

Guldan.name: Horrify
Guldan.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

Guldan.name: Rain of Destruction
Guldan.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

Guldan.name: Life Tap
Guldan.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% of Gul'dan's Mana.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 50% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

Hanzo.name: Storm Bow
Hanzo.description: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.

Hanzo.name: Scatter Arrow
Hanzo.description: Fire an arrow that deals 88 (+4% per level) to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into 5 arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to 4 additional times, and deal 88 (+4% per level) damage each to the first enemy hit.

Hanzo.name: Sonic Arrow
Hanzo.description: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 5 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 165 (+4% per level) damage to them and follows them as they move.

Hanzo.name: Dragonstrike
Hanzo.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

Hanzo.name: Dragon's Arrow
Hanzo.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

Hanzo.name: Natural Agility
Hanzo.description: Jump over unpathable terrain or Structures, up to a maximum range.

1.name: Target Practice
1.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

1.name: Simple Geometry
1.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

1.name: Redemption
1.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

4.name: Explosive Arrows
4.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.

4.name: Serrated Arrows
4.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Ignore All Distractions
4.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

7.name: The Dragon Hungers
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

7.name: Never Outmatched
7.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 30%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

Illidan.name: Dive
Illidan.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

Illidan.name: Sweeping Strike
Illidan.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

Illidan.name: Evasion
Illidan.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

Illidan.name: The Hunt
Illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

Illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

Illidan.name: Betrayer's Thirst
Illidan.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Rapid Chase
4.description: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Friend or Foe
4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 8% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Imperius.name: Celestial Charge
Imperius.description: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for 1 second and deal 70 (+4% per level) additional damage when it fully finishes.

Imperius.name: Solarion's Fire
Imperius.description: Release a fiery wave that deals 100 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies hit by the center take 50% bonus damage and are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

Imperius.name: Molten Armor
Imperius.description: Shroud Imperius in flames for 3 seconds, striking a nearby enemy for 19 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. Imperius heals for 50% of the damage dealt, increased to 100% against Heroes.

Imperius.name: Angelic Armaments
Imperius.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

Imperius.name: Wrath of the Angiris
Imperius.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

Imperius.name: Valorous Brand
Imperius.description: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 (+4% per level) per mark.

1.name: Impaling Light
1.description: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 100% and cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

1.name: Consuming Flame
1.description: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.

1.name: Burn the Impure
1.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

4.name: Sovereign Armor
4.description: Molten Armor grants 25 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.

4.name: Battle Hunger
4.description: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 60%.

4.name: Press Forward
4.description: Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).

7.name: Flash of Anger
7.description: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 180 (+4% per level) damage around the target and grants Imperius 300 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blaze of Glory
7.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

7.name: Holy Fervor
7.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.

10.name: Angelic Armaments
10.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

10.name: Wrath of the Angiris
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

13.name: Pathetic Mortals
13.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 40% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Divine Rage
13.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

13.name: Heat of Battle
13.description: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

16.name: Celestial Swiftness
16.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

16.name: Melting Touch
16.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Valorous Pursuit
16.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Heavenly Host
20.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: Unrelenting Descent
20.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.

20.name: Brand of Solarion
20.description: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 3 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

20.name: Impervious
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

Jaina.name: Frostbolt
Jaina.description: Deal 184 (+4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

Jaina.name: Blizzard
Jaina.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

Jaina.name: Cone of Cold
