Jaina.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

Jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
Jaina.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Jaina.name: Ring of Frost
Jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

Jaina.name: Frostbite
Jaina.description: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.  Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

Jaina.name: Improved Ice Block
Jaina.description: Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 20%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 60%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

Johanna.name: Punish
Johanna.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

Johanna.name: Condemn
Johanna.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

Johanna.name: Shield Glare
Johanna.description: Deal 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

Johanna.name: Falling Sword
Johanna.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

Johanna.name: Blessed Shield
Johanna.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Johanna.name: Iron Skin
Johanna.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

1.name: Reinforce
1.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 60 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Hold Your Ground
1.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 60% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.name: Laws of Hope
1.description: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.75 seconds and refund 3 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 8 targets.

4.name: Conviction
4.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

4.name: Sins Exposed
4.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

7.name: Subdue
7.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

7.name: Zealous Glare
7.description: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 1 second. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Roar
13.description: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

13.name: Holy Fury
13.description: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Hammer
13.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

16.name: Fanaticism
16.description: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 2 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Blinded By The Light
20.description: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

Junkrat.name: Frag Launcher
Junkrat.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 118 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Junkrat.name: Concussion Mine
Junkrat.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.  Limit 1 active mine.

Junkrat.name: Steel Trap
Junkrat.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.  Limit 1 active trap.

Junkrat.name: RIP-Tire
Junkrat.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

Junkrat.name: Rocket Ride
Junkrat.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

Junkrat.name: Total Mayhem
Junkrat.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

1.name: Tricky Shuffles
1.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 60% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Blow 'Em Up!
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

4.name: BOOM POW
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Chattering Teeth
4.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

7.name: Bogged Down
7.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Dirty Trickster
7.description: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Bombs Away
13.description: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 25% bonus damage.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
13.description: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.name: I Hate Waiting!
20.description: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 12 seconds.

Kaelthas.name: Flamestrike
Kaelthas.description: After 1 second, deal 345 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

Kaelthas.name: Living Bomb
Kaelthas.description: Deal 126 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.  Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

Kaelthas.name: Gravity Lapse
Kaelthas.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second.  Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

Kaelthas.name: Pyroblast
Kaelthas.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

Kaelthas.name: Phoenix
Kaelthas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

Kaelthas.name: Verdant Spheres
Kaelthas.description: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Ignite
16.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Death and Decay
KelThuzad.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

KelThuzad.name: Frost Nova
KelThuzad.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

KelThuzad.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzad.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Frost Blast
KelThuzad.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Shadow Fissure
KelThuzad.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Master of the Cold Dark
KelThuzad.description: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.  Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.  Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.  Blight: 0/30

KelThuzad.name: Glacial Spike
KelThuzad.description: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 60 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Ice Cold
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.4 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

Kerrigan.name: Ravage
Kerrigan.description: Leap to a target, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

Kerrigan.name: Impaling Blades
Kerrigan.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for 1 second.

Kerrigan.name: Primal Grasp
Kerrigan.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 195 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Kerrigan.name: Summon Ultralisk
Kerrigan.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

Kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Kerrigan.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

Kerrigan.name: Assimilation
Kerrigan.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

1.name: Assimilation Mastery
1.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

1.name: Fury of the Swarm
1.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

4.name: Sharpened Blades
4.description: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
4.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

7.name: Queen of Blades
7.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

7.name: Boundless Fury
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.name: Psionic Barrier
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Volatile Power
13.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

13.name: Chrysalis
13.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.name: Mounting Potency
16.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

16.name: Painful Spikes
16.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

16.name: Unbridled Energy
16.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Assimilation Blades
20.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

Kharazim.name: Radiant Dash
Kharazim.description: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Kharazim.name: Breath of Heaven
Kharazim.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 276 (+4% per level) and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

Kharazim.name: Deadly Reach
Kharazim.description: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

Kharazim.name: Seven-Sided Strike
Kharazim.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

Kharazim.name: Divine Palm
Kharazim.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

Kharazim.name: Pick Your Trait
Kharazim.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

1.name: Transcendence
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Iron Fists
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Insight
1.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

4.name: Spirit Ally
4.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.name: Earth Ally
4.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.name: Air Ally
4.description: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Blinding Speed
7.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

7.name: Heavenly Zeal
7.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Blazing Fists
7.description: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Divine Palm
10.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
10.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Quicksilver
13.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Cleansing Touch
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.name: Echo of Heaven
16.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

20.name: Peaceful Repose
20.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Transgression
20.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

Leoric.name: Skeletal Swing
Leoric.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

Leoric.name: Drain Hope
Leoric.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while this is active.

Leoric.name: Wraith Walk
Leoric.description: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.

Leoric.name: Entomb
Leoric.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

Leoric.name: March of the Black King
Leoric.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

Leoric.name: Undying
Leoric.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.  Wrath Of The Bone King  Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

LeoricUndyingTrait.name: Drain Essence
LeoricUndyingTrait.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

1.name: Consume Vitality
1.description: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

1.name: Fealty Unto Death
1.description: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1.25% of his maximum Health and 6 Mana.

1.name: Ossein Renewal
1.description: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.name: Ghastly Reach
4.description: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

4.name: Paralyzing Rage
4.description: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
4.description: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Willing Vessel
7.description: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Drain Momentum
7.description: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Hopelessness
7.description: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

10.name: Entomb
10.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

10.name: March of the Black King
10.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Unyielding Despair
13.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Spectral Leech
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hardened Bones
20.description: Gain 50 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

LiLi.name: Healing Brew
LiLi.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 175 (+4% per level) Health.

LiLi.name: Cloud Serpent
LiLi.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 (+4% per level) damage and heals the ally for 20 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

LiLi.name: Blinding Wind
LiLi.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 (+4% per level) damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

LiLi.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
LiLi.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

LiLi.name: Water Dragon
LiLi.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

LiLi.name: Fast Feet
LiLi.description: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Wind Serpent
1.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 125% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Serpent Sidekick
4.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

4.name: Surging Winds
4.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Lightning Serpent
7.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Mass Vortex
13.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for an additional 1% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

LiMing.name: Magic Missiles
LiMing.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 (+3.5% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

LiMing.name: Arcane Orb
LiMing.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 (+3% per level) more damage.

LiMing.name: Disintegrate
LiMing.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

LiMing.name: Wave of Force
LiMing.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

LiMing.name: Critical Mass
LiMing.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

1.name: Force Armor
1.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges.  Passive: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

4.name: Charged Blast
4.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.

4.name: Dominance
4.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

7.name: Seeker
7.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Zei's Vengeance
7.description: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 30%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

7.name: Calamity
7.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave of Force
10.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

13.name: Cannoneer
13.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

16.name: Fireflies
16.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).

16.name: Diamond Skin
16.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

LostVikings.name: Spin To Win!
LostVikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

LostVikings.name: Jump!
LostVikings.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

LostVikings.name: Viking Bribery
LostVikings.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

LostVikings.name: Longboat Raid!
LostVikings.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

LostVikings.name: Play Again!
LostVikings.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

LostVikings.name: Viking Hoard
LostVikings.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.  Current Bonus: 0 Regen per second

LostVikings.name: Go Go Go!
LostVikings.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

LostVikings.name: Select Olaf
LostVikings.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.  Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

LostVikings.name: Select Baleog
LostVikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

LostVikings.name: Select Erik
LostVikings.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

LostVikings.name: Select All Vikings
LostVikings.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

LostVikings.name: Norse Force!
LostVikings.description: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

LostVikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
LostVikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.name: Mortar
LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.description: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing 205 (+4% per level) damage in a large area.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

LtMorales.name: Healing Beam
LtMorales.description: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 (+4% per level) Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second.  Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

LtMorales.name: Safeguard
LtMorales.description: Grant target ally Hero 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

LtMorales.name: Displacement Grenade
LtMorales.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 (+4% per level) to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

LtMorales.name: Stim Drone
LtMorales.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

LtMorales.name: Medivac Dropship
LtMorales.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

LtMorales.name: Caduceus Reactor
LtMorales.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

1.name: Caduceus Feedback
1.description: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

1.name: Life Support
1.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

1.name: Clear!
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

4.name: Cellular Reactor
4.description: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

4.name: Trauma Trigger
4.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

4.name: Blast Shield
4.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

7.name: Physical Therapy
7.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Vanadium Plating
7.description: Passive: Increase the duration of Safeguard by 1 second.  While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 20 Armor.

7.name: Medi-Drone
7.description: Allies with Safeguard receive 50% of the healing done by Healing Beam on another ally.

10.name: Stim Drone
10.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.name: Medivac Dropship
10.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.name: EMP Grenade
13.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

13.name: System Shock
13.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Second Opinion
13.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

16.name: Extended Care
16.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

16.name: First Responder
16.description: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

16.name: Shield Sequencer
16.description: Safeguard gains a second charge.

20.name: Hyperactivity
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

20.name: Safe Zone
20.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

20.name: Reinforcements
20.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.  Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
20.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

Lucio.name: Soundwave
Lucio.description: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

Lucio.name: Crossfade
Lucio.description: Currently playing Speed Boost, increasing the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 10%.  Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

Lucio.name: Amp It Up
Lucio.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 112 (+4% per level) Health per second and Speed Boost to 30% increased Movement Speed.

Lucio.name: Sound Barrier
Lucio.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

Lucio.name: High Five
Lucio.description: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

Lucio.name: Push Off
Lucio.description: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take 100 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1 second.

Lucio.name: Wall Ride
Lucio.description: When moving alongside terrain, Lúcio begins to Wall Ride for 2 seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lúcio can walk through units and gains 20% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

1.name: Party Mix
1.description: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

1.name: Smooth Moves
1.description: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt and restore 0.5 Mana.  Passive: Increase Wall Ride duration by 1 second.

4.name: Subwoofer
4.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further.  Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Supersonic
4.description: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

7.name: Good Vibrations
7.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a 35 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.

7.name: Reverse Amp
7.description: Blast Lúcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

10.name: High Five
10.description: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

13.name: All Together
13.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

13.name: Heavy Casters
13.description: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Slip
13.description: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.

16.name: Rejuvenescência
16.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health each second.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds.  Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.

16.name: Up To Eleven
16.description: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by 2 seconds.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the Shield now decays over 4 seconds.

20.name: Mixing Fire
20.description: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increase the duration of Amp It Up by 1 second.

20.name: House Party
20.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 8% increased healing.

20.name: Summer Anthem
20.description: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.

Lunara.name: Noxious Blossom
Lunara.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage.

Lunara.name: Crippling Spores
Lunara.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

Lunara.name: Wisp
Lunara.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more 2 seconds, its vision radius is increased by 75%.  Lasts 45 seconds.

Lunara.name: Thornwood Vine
Lunara.description: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Lunara.name: Leaping Strike
Lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Lunara.name: Nature's Toxin
Lunara.description: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 30 (+5% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

Lunara.name: Dryad's Swiftness
Lunara.description: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.

1.name: Sentinel Wisp
1.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

1.name: Natural Perspective
1.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

1.name: Hippity Hop
1.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 4 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

4.name: Blossom Swell
4.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.  This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.

4.name: Siphoning Toxin
4.description: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

4.name: Nature's Culling
4.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.name: Choking Pollen
7.description: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 150% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.name: Wild Vigor
7.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Endless Spores
13.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.

13.name: Let Them Wither
13.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Abolish Magic
13.description: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Accelerated Contamination
16.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Unfair Advantage
16.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

20.name: Intensifying Toxin
20.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

20.name: Galloping Gait
20.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

Maiev.name: Fan of Knives
Maiev.description: Deal 152 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a crescent area.  Hitting at least 2 enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.

Maiev.name: Umbral Bind
Maiev.description: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage and breaking the tether.

Maiev.name: Spirit of Vengeance
Maiev.description: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by 4 seconds.

Maiev.name: Containment Disc
Maiev.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

Maiev.name: Warden's Cage
Maiev.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

Maiev.name: Vault of the Wardens
Maiev.description: Leap into the air, becoming Immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.

1.name: Bonds of Justice
1.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
1.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Naisha's Memento
1.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

4.name: Pin Down
4.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

4.name: Blade Dance
4.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

4.name: Sudden Vengeance
4.description: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Wrath
7.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.

7.name: Bonds of Corruption
7.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

7.name: Ruthless Spirit
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

10.name: Containment Disc
10.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

10.name: Warden's Cage
10.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bladed Armor
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

13.name: Chain Gang
13.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shadow Armor
13.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Cruel Chain
16.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

16.name: Vengeful Knives
16.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

16.name: Armored Assault
16.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
20.description: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

Malfurion.name: Regrowth
Malfurion.description: Heal an allied Hero for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 20 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Moonfire
Malfurion.description: Deal 90 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for 2 seconds.  Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 (+4% per level) Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

Malfurion.name: Entangling Roots
Malfurion.description: Root enemy Heroes in an area for 1.25 seconds, and deal 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Tranquility
Malfurion.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

Malfurion.name: Twilight Dream
Malfurion.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Innervate
Malfurion.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.

1.name: Rejuvenation
1.description: Malfurion gains 100% base Health regeneration for every active Regrowth.

1.name: Celestial Alignment
1.description: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
1.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

4.name: Strangling Vines
4.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

4.name: Deep Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

7.name: Wild Growth
7.description: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

7.name: Tenacious Roots
7.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

7.name: Nature's Cure
7.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Nature's Swiftness
13.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

13.name: Hindering Moonfire
13.description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Revitalize
13.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

16.name: Nature's Balance
16.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

16.name: Moonlit Harmony
16.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Lifebloom
