20.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

20.name: Lunar Shower
20.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

MalGanis.name: Fel Claws
MalGanis.description: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

MalGanis.name: Necrotic Embrace
MalGanis.description: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

MalGanis.name: Night Rush
MalGanis.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

MalGanis.name: Dark Conversion
MalGanis.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

MalGanis.name: Carrion Swarm
MalGanis.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

MalGanis.name: Vampiric Touch
MalGanis.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

1.name: Winged Guard
1.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Aura
1.description: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

1.name: Time to Feed
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 52 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

4.name: Fueled by Torment
4.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

4.name: Might of Sargeras
4.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Echo of Doom
4.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Black Claws
7.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage.

7.name: Will of Tichondrius
7.description: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 3% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

7.name: Spreading Plague
7.description: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Nightmare Fuel
7.description: Casting Night Rush while in a bush increases its duration to 2.75 seconds. Basic Attacks deal 200% more damage to Sleeping targets.

10.name: Carrion Swarm
10.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

10.name: Dark Conversion
10.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

13.name: Deep Sleep
13.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

13.name: The Night Beckons
13.description: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Blood Rush
13.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

16.name: Plague Bats
16.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Frenzied Assault
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 50% Attack Speed and 20% increased Physical Damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Blind as a Bat
16.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

20.name: Seeker Swarm
20.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
20.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

20.name: Vanquish the Weak
20.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

20.name: Alone in the Dark
20.description: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

Malthael.name: Soul Rip
Malthael.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and healing Malthael for 25 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

Malthael.name: Wraith Strike
Malthael.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

Malthael.name: Death Shroud
Malthael.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

Malthael.name: Tormented Souls
Malthael.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

Malthael.name: Last Rites
Malthael.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

Malthael.name: Reaper's Mark
Malthael.description: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

1.name: Death's Reach
1.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

1.name: Fear the Reaper
1.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

4.name: Die Alone
4.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

4.name: Throwing Shade
4.description: Quest: Hit 12 Heroes with Death Shroud.  Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

4.name: Black Harvest
4.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cold Hand
7.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Massacre
7.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

7.name: Touch of Death
7.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Tormented Souls
10.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

10.name: Last Rites
10.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

13.name: Soul Siphon
13.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Ethereal Existence
13.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

16.name: Mortality
16.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Memento Mori
16.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

Medivh.name: Arcane Rift
Medivh.description: Launch a rift that deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.  Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

Medivh.name: Force of Will
Medivh.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.  Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.

Medivh.name: Portal
Medivh.description: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

Medivh.name: Poly Bomb
Medivh.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

Medivh.name: Ley Line Seal
Medivh.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

Medivh.name: Raven Form
Medivh.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

Medivh.name: Raven Form
Medivh.description: Transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over terrain and is immune to all effects.

1.name: Winds of Celerity
1.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

1.name: Raven's Intellect
1.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.

4.name: Raven Familiar
4.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

7.name: Mystic Assault
7.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

7.name: Force of Magic
7.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

13.name: Circle of Protection
13.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Enduring Will
13.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

13.name: Reabsorption
13.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

16.name: Arcane Charge
16.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

16.name: Temporal Flux
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.

16.name: Stable Portal
16.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Dust of Disappearance
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Mephisto.name: Skull Missile
Mephisto.description: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

Mephisto.name: Lightning Nova
Mephisto.description: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.  Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.

Mephisto.name: Shade of Mephisto
Mephisto.description: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location.  After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.

Mephisto.name: Consume Souls
Mephisto.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

Mephisto.name: Durance of Hate
Mephisto.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

Mephisto.name: Lord Of Hatred
Mephisto.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.  Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

1.name: Unyielding Power
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

1.name: Furious Spark
1.description: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 95 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

1.name: Malicious Intent
1.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.

4.name: Hateful Mending
4.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

4.name: Static Barrier
4.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Spite
4.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 125%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Ghastly Armor
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

7.name: Frost Storm
7.description: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

7.name: Trickery
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

10.name: Consume Souls
10.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Durance of Hate
10.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

13.name: Abhorred Skull
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

13.name: Hysteria
13.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

13.name: Shard of Hate
13.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

16.name: Lightning Reaction
16.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

16.name: Static Field
16.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Animosity
16.description: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

20.name: Consumed by Hatred
20.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

20.name: Unspeakable Horror
20.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

20.name: Mimic
20.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

20.name: Shade Lord
20.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

Muradin.name: Storm Bolt
Muradin.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes.  Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

Muradin.name: Thunder Clap
Muradin.description: Blast nearby enemies for 96 (+4% per level) damage and Slow them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by 25% for the duration.

Muradin.name: Dwarf Toss
Muradin.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

Muradin.name: Avatar
Muradin.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

Muradin.name: Haymaker
Muradin.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

Muradin.name: Second Wind
Muradin.description: Muradin restores 55 (+4% per level) Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 (+4% per level) Health per second.

1.name: Perfect Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

1.name: Third Wind
1.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Sledgehammer
4.description: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of his baseline quest.

4.name: Reverberation
4.description: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

4.name: Thunder Burn
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% damage.

7.name: Heavy Impact
7.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by 80% for 1.25 seconds.

7.name: Give 'em the Axe!
7.description: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Skullcracker
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Avatar
10.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Haymaker
10.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

13.name: Healing Static
13.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.name: Thunder Strike
13.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.

13.name: Bronzebeard Rage
13.description: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Dwarf Launch
16.description: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Stoneform
16.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Grand Slam
20.description: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Murky.name: Slime
Murky.description: Deal 86 (+4% per level) damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%.  Deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

Murky.name: Pufferfish
Murky.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 (+5.5% per level) health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

Murky.name: Safety Bubble
Murky.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

Murky.name: March of the Murlocs
Murky.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

Murky.name: Octo-Grab
Murky.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

Murky.name: Spawn Egg
Murky.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.name: Slime Time
4.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.name: Tufferfish
4.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon
7.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

7.name: Slippery When Wet
7.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Time to Krill
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
13.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.name: Egg Shell
13.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

16.name: Toxic Buildup
16.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.name: Fish Oil
16.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.name: Wrath of Cod
16.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.name: Making Inky
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Corpse Spiders
Nazeebo.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 (+4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Zombie Wall
Nazeebo.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 (+4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Plague of Toads
Nazeebo.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Nazeebo.name: Gargantuan
Nazeebo.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

Nazeebo.name: Ravenous Spirit
Nazeebo.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Voodoo Ritual
Nazeebo.description: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 67 (+4% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds.  Quest: If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.

WitchDoctorGargantuan.name: Gargantuan Stomp
WitchDoctorGargantuan.description: Order the Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

1.name: Widowmakers
1.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

1.name: Pandemic
1.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

Nova.name: Snipe
Nova.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 6%, stacking up to 30%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

Nova.name: Pinning Shot
Nova.description: Deal 100 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

Nova.name: Holo Decoy
Nova.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Nova.name: Triple Tap
Nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

Nova.name: Precision Strike
Nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

Nova.name: Permanent Cloak
Nova.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

Nova.name: Ghost Protocol
Nova.description: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: Perfect Shot
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

13.name: Double Tap
13.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Ionic Force Field
13.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

16.name: Explosive Round
16.description: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apollo Suit
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Orphea.name: Shadow Waltz
Orphea.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 2 seconds, refunds 40 Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.

Orphea.name: Chomp
Orphea.description: After 0.625 seconds, deal 285 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.

Orphea.name: Dread
Orphea.description: Release a wave of dread that deals 85 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Dread erupts 0.75 seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies in the area by 25% for 2 seconds.

Orphea.name: Crushing Jaws
Orphea.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

Orphea.name: Eternal Feast
Orphea.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

Orphea.name: Overflowing Chaos
Orphea.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times.  While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.

1.name: En Pointe
1.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.

1.name: Growing Nightmare
1.description: When the wave of Dread hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, its eruption damage is increased by 60%.

1.name: Ancestral Strength
1.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 20% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies and grant 1 additional Chaos when hitting Heroes.

4.name: Allegrissimo
4.description: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Backbiter
4.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.

4.name: Fright
4.description: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path.

7.name: Insatiable
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Ravenous Hunger
7.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

7.name: Mind Devourer
7.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 4, up to 160.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

10.name: Eternal Feast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

10.name: Crushing Jaws
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Determination
13.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

13.name: Invasive Miasma
13.description: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

16.name: Bond of Anguish
16.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

16.name: Dead Magic
16.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

16.name: Lurking Terror
16.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.

20.name: Monster Within
20.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
20.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Eldritch Conduit
20.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

20.name: Final Toccata
20.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

Probius.name: Disruption Pulse
Probius.description: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through.  Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

Probius.name: Warp Rift
Probius.description: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds.  Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Probius.name: Photon Cannon
Probius.description: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds.  Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field.  Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

Probius.name: Pylon Overcharge
Probius.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

Probius.name: Null Gate
Probius.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

Probius.name: Warp In Pylon
Probius.description: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

Probius.name: Worker Rush
Probius.description: Activate to gain an additional 60% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.  Worker Rush is always active while at the Hall of Storms.  Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

1.name: Echo Pulse
1.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

1.name: Warp Resonance
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Gather Minerals
1.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

4.name: Photon Barrier
4.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

4.name: Turbo Charged
4.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

4.name: Shield Capacitor
4.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

7.name: Particle Accelerator
7.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

7.name: Rift Shock
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

7.name: Tower Defense
7.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Pylon Overcharge
10.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

10.name: Null Gate
10.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

13.name: Aggressive Matrix
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

13.name: Power Overflowing
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

13.name: Shield Battery
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 112 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

16.name: Quantum Entanglement
16.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

16.name: Gravity Well
16.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

16.name: Repulsor
16.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

16.name: Interference
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
20.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

20.name: Gate Keeper
20.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
20.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.   Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

20.name: Probius Loop
20.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

Qhira.name: Carnage
Qhira.description: Unleash your sword in the target direction, continuously dealing 30 (+4% per level) damage to enemies caught in its path.

Qhira.name: Blood Rage
Qhira.description: Passive: Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for 44 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. Stacks 5 times.  Active: Qhira deals 32 (+4% per level) damage and heals for 85 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.

Qhira.name: Revolving Sweep
Qhira.description: Attach your sword on the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.25 seconds. Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, swinging around the target for 2.75 seconds and dealing 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies between you and the target.  Re-activate to send you to the target's location knocking them away, dealing 108 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Qhira.name: Unrelenting Strikes
Qhira.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1 second.

Qhira.name: Final Strike
Qhira.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

Qhira.name: Grappling Hook
Qhira.description: Qhira fires a grappling hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take 35 (+4% per level) damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage.  Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.

1.name: Maximum Effort
1.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Fatal Wounds
1.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 40% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Finishing Touch
1.description: Gain 15%  Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 15% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Upstage
4.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

4.name: Ensnaring Swing
4.description: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 30% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Your Pain, My Gain
4.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

7.name: The Thirst
7.description: Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 12% additional damage and restores 50% of the total damage dealt as Health. Damage stacks up to 10 times.

7.name: Healmonger
7.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.

7.name: Siphoning Link
7.description: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

10.name: Unrelenting Strikes
10.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1 second.

10.name: Final Strike
10.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

13.name: Chainsaw
13.description: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

13.name: Pulsing Pain
13.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: The Hunted
13.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

16.name: Booming Kick
16.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

16.name: Lingering Ailment
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep's initial impact and swing have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Swing Life Away
16.description: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 150% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 50 Spell Armor for 2 seconds after the re-activation impact.

20.name: Silent Killer
20.description: The initial cast of Unrelenting Strikes Silences enemies who are within the area for 2 seconds and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds when hitting enemy Heroes.

20.name: Unleashed Potential
20.description: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.

20.name: Utility Belt
20.description: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 5 seconds.

20.name: No Sanctuary
20.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.

Ragnaros.name: Empower Sulfuras
Ragnaros.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

Ragnaros.name: Living Meteor
Ragnaros.description: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

Ragnaros.name: Blast Wave
Ragnaros.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

Ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Smash
Ragnaros.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

Ragnaros.name: Lava Wave
Ragnaros.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

Ragnaros.name: Molten Core
Ragnaros.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Sulfuras Smash
RagnarosBigRag.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Explosive Rune
RagnarosBigRag.description: Create a rune that deals 285 (+4% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies after 1.5 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Molten Swing
RagnarosBigRag.description: Swing Sulfuras in a wide arc, dealing 161 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning enemies for 1 second.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Meteor Shower
RagnarosBigRag.description: Vector Targeting Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals 151 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
1.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

1.name: Shifting Meteor
1.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it.  Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

1.name: Engulfing Flame
1.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

4.name: Fire Ward
4.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Slow Burn
4.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Catching Fire
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
7.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Molten Power
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

Raynor.name: Penetrating Round
Raynor.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

Raynor.name: Inspire
Raynor.description: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

Raynor.name: Adrenaline Rush
Raynor.description: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

Raynor.name: Hyperion
Raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

Raynor.name: Raynor's Raider
Raynor.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

Raynor.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
Raynor.description: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the main target.

1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

1.name: Ace In The Hole
1.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Sustaining Rounds
4.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

7.name: Fuel The Rush
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50.  While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Heavy Slugs
7.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Debilitating Rounds
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from 65 to 45, and its cooldown by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

13.name: Rallying Cry
13.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

16.name: Give Me More!
16.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Bounty Hunter
16.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.name: Indomitable Resolve
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

20.name: Weak Spot Acquired
20.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

Rehgar.name: Chain Heal
Rehgar.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 (+4% per level) Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 (+4% per level) Health to them.

Rehgar.name: Lightning Shield
Rehgar.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Earthbind Totem
Rehgar.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Bloodlust
Rehgar.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Ancestral Healing
Rehgar.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

Rehgar.name: Ghost Wolf
Rehgar.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

1.name: Electric Charge
1.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%. Heal for 30% of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes.

1.name: Colossal Totem
1.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50% and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

1.name: Wolf Run
1.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%. If an enemy Hero is hit by Ghost Wolf's Basic Attack, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Stormcaller
4.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

4.name: Feral Heart
4.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

4.name: Healing Totem
4.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

7.name: Grounded Totem
7.description: Increase the Health of Earthbind Totem by 100%.  Enemy Heroes who are Slowed by Earthbind Totem also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 40%.

7.name: Blood and Thunder
7.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Tidal Waves
13.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 seconds for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 55 to 40.

13.name: Earthliving Enchant
13.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

13.name: Earth Shield
13.description: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.  Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
16.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: Increases healing amount by 75%. Allies near the target are healed for 75% of the amount of Health regained.

20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
20.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Spirit Swoop
Rexxar.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Misha, Charge!
Rexxar.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Mend Pet
Rexxar.description: Heal Misha for 714 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Unleash the Boars
Rexxar.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Bestial Wrath
Rexxar.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Misha, Focus!
Rexxar.description: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed.  Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.  Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar.  Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.description: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.name: Animal Husbandry
4.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

Samuro.name: Mirror Image
Samuro.description: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 Mirror Images for 18 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 9 (+4% per level) damage. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Maximum 2 Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.

Samuro.name: Critical Strike
Samuro.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.  Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

Samuro.name: Wind Walk
Samuro.description: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.  While Stealthed, Samuro's Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.

Samuro.name: Bladestorm
Samuro.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

Samuro.name: Image Transmission
Samuro.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.  Advancing Strikes  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

Samuro.name: Illusion Master
Samuro.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

Samuro.name: Select Samuro
Samuro.description: Select Samuro  Issue orders to Samuro only.

Samuro.name: Select All
Samuro.description: Select All  Issue orders to Samuro and all Mirror Images.

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.  Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by 10 for 2 seconds.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.  Samuro's Critical Strikes reduce the cooldown of Windwalk by 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One With The Wind
4.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 30 Physical Armor.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.description: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.description: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

20.name: Dance Of Death
