20.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 25% damage.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their health by 50% and their duration is increased to 36 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

SgtHammer.name: Spider Mines
SgtHammer.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.  Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

SgtHammer.name: Concussive Blast
SgtHammer.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.  Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

SgtHammer.name: Neosteel Plating
SgtHammer.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

SgtHammer.name: Napalm Strike
SgtHammer.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

SgtHammer.name: Blunt Force Gun
SgtHammer.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

SgtHammer.name: Siege Mode
SgtHammer.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

SgtHammer.name: Thrusters
SgtHammer.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Hall of Storms. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Barricade
4.description: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

4.name: Siege Tactics
4.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

4.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
4.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Pulse Detonation Core
7.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

7.name: Hover Siege Mode
7.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Graduating Range
7.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
13.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

13.name: Entrenched
13.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

13.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
13.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

16.name: Mechanical Know-how
16.description: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Giant Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.name: Shrapnel Mines
20.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10, up to 30, for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ultra Capacitors
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

Sonya.name: Ancient Spear
Sonya.description: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

Sonya.name: Seismic Slam
Sonya.description: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

Sonya.name: Whirlwind
Sonya.description: Deals 126 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

Sonya.name: Leap
Sonya.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

Sonya.name: Wrath of the Berserker
Sonya.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

Sonya.name: Fury
Sonya.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Furious Blow
1.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

1.name: War Paint
1.description: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Tough As Nails
1.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

4.name: Hurricane
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

4.name: Shot Of Fury
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

7.name: Life Funnel
7.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

7.name: Battle Rage
7.description: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.name: Ruthless
13.description: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

13.name: No Escape
13.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.name: Giant Slammer
16.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

16.name: Rampage
16.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Striding Giant
20.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Composite Spear
20.description: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

Stitches.name: Hook
Stitches.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 (+4% per level) damage.

Stitches.name: Slam
Stitches.description: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact area take 40% more damage and are Slowed by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

Stitches.name: Devour
Stitches.description: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.

Stitches.name: Putrid Bile
Stitches.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

Stitches.name: Gorge
Stitches.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

Stitches.name: Vile Cleaver
Stitches.description: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for 45 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of 10 seconds.

Stitches.name: Helping Hand
Stitches.description: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. When used to pull allies, the cooldown of Hook is reduced by 50%.

1.name: Savor the Flavor
1.description: When Devour hits a Hero, Stitches heals for an additional 8% of his maximum Health and Mana over 4 seconds.  Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Devour increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 1.5.

1.name: Patchwork Creation
1.description: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 (+4% per level) Health. Takedowns restore 240 (+4% per level) Health.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30.  Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

4.name: Serrated Edge
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Playtime!
4.description: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

4.name: Chop Chop
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

7.name: Blight
7.description: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Cannibalize
7.description: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Tenderizer
7.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Digestive Juices
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

13.name: Gas Flare
13.description: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.

16.name: Fishing Hook
16.description: Hook has an additional 50% range.

16.name: Meat Hook
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches's Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Potent Bile
20.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

20.name: Second Helping
20.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

20.name: Shambling Horror
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

Stukov.name: Healing Pathogen
Stukov.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 (+4% per level) Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds.  Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero 1 time.

Stukov.name: Weighted Pustule
Stukov.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 (+4% per level) damage upon expiring or being removed.

Stukov.name: Lurking Arm
Stukov.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.  Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

Stukov.name: Massive Shove
Stukov.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

Stukov.name: Flailing Swipe
Stukov.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

Stukov.name: Bio-Kill Switch
Stukov.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 (+4% per level) Health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 (+4% per level) damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.  Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Reactive Ballistospores
1.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

1.name: Low Blow
1.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

1.name: Spine Launcher
1.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 75 for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

7.name: Growing Infestation
7.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: It Hungers
13.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 10 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

13.name: Lingering Spines
13.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

13.name: Poppin' Pustules
13.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Top Off
20.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Withering Fire
Sylvanas.description: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 (+4% per level) damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.

Sylvanas.name: Shadow Dagger
Sylvanas.description: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 (+4% per level) damage and an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.

Sylvanas.name: Haunting Wave
Sylvanas.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

Sylvanas.name: Wailing Arrow
Sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

Sylvanas.name: Mind Control
Sylvanas.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Black Arrows
Sylvanas.description: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.   Banshee's Curse  Basic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.

1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

1.name: Unfurling Shadows
1.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

1.name: Overwhelming Affliction
1.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

4.name: Unstable Poison
4.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

4.name: Mercenary Queen
4.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

4.name: Possession
4.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

7.name: Lost Soul
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Festering Wounds
7.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Cold Embrace
13.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

13.name: Remorseless
13.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

16.name: Life Drain
16.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

16.name: Will of the Forsaken
16.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Withering Barrage
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Tassadar.name: Plasma Shield
Tassadar.description: Grant an allied Hero, Minion, or Structure a Shield that absorbs 455 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. If the target is a Hero, they heal for 40% of their Basic Attack damage done while Shielded.

Tassadar.name: Psionic Storm
Tassadar.description: Deal 82 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

Tassadar.name: Dimensional Shift
Tassadar.description: Tassadar becomes Invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

Tassadar.name: Archon
Tassadar.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

Tassadar.name: Force Wall
Tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 35%.

Tassadar.name: Oracle
Tassadar.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.  Distortion Beam  Tassadar's Basic Attack is a beam that Slows enemy units by 25%.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm.  Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

1.name: Templar's Will
1.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second.  Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%.  Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
1.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.  Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 15%.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 30%.

4.name: Khala's Celerity
4.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Khala's Embrace
4.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

4.name: Khala's Light
4.description: Plasma Shield grants Heroes 20 Armor for 3 seconds upon breaking or expiring, causing them to take 20% less damage.

7.name: Psionic Projection
7.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

7.name: Resonation
7.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 60%.

7.name: Mental Acuity
7.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

10.name: Force Wall
10.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 35%.

13.name: Deep Shift
13.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

13.name: Adun's Wisdom
13.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster.

13.name: Nullification
13.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Phase Disruption
16.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 35, causing them to take 35% more damage from Basic Attacks.

16.name: Psionic Echo
16.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

16.name: Focused Beam
16.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1.5% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

20.name: Prismatic Link
20.description: Distortion Beam bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 50% damage.

20.name: Shield Battery
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

TheButcher.name: Hamstring
TheButcher.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

TheButcher.name: Butcher's Brand
TheButcher.description: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.  Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.

TheButcher.name: Ruthless Onslaught
TheButcher.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.

TheButcher.name: Furnace Blast
TheButcher.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

TheButcher.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
TheButcher.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

TheButcher.name: Fresh Meat
TheButcher.description: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.  Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

1.name: Invigoration
1.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Chop Meat
1.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Flail Axe
4.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

4.name: Cheap Shot
4.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

7.name: Insatiable Blade
7.description: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

7.name: Victuals
7.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

7.name: Meat Shield
7.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

10.name: Furnace Blast
10.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
10.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

13.name: Cleaver
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

13.name: Savage Charge
13.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Brutal Strike
13.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

16.name: Crippling Slam
16.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

16.name: Enraged
16.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

16.name: Blood Frenzy
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

20.name: Fires of Hell
20.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

20.name: Slaughterhouse
20.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Thrall.name: Chain Lightning
Thrall.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

Thrall.name: Feral Spirit
Thrall.description: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

Thrall.name: Windfury
Thrall.description: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

Thrall.name: Sundering
Thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

Thrall.name: Earthquake
Thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

Thrall.name: Frostwolf Resilience
Thrall.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

1.name: Echo of the Elements
1.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

1.name: Crash Lightning
1.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Wind Rush
20.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

Tracer.name: Blink
Tracer.description: Dash towards an area.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Tracer.name: Melee
Tracer.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

Tracer.name: Recall
Tracer.description: Tracer returns to the position she was at 3 seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.

Tracer.name: Pulse Bomb
Tracer.description: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 (+6% per level) damage to them and 180 (+6% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.  This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

Tracer.name: Reload
Tracer.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.

1.name: Pulse Strike
1.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

1.name: Slipstream
1.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

4.name: Parting Gift
4.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

4.name: Untouchable
4.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Jumper
7.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Increases Melee's radius by 32%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 91 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

Tychus.name: Overkill
Tychus.description: Deal 552 (+4% per level) damage to the target and 276 (+4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while Channeling.

Tychus.name: Frag Grenade
Tychus.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

Tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
Tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

Tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
Tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

Tychus.name: Minigun
Tychus.description: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

TychusOdinNoHealth.name: Annihilate
TychusOdinNoHealth.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

TychusOdinNoHealth.name: Ragnarok Missiles
TychusOdinNoHealth.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 5 seconds.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Tactician
1.description: Casting Run And Gun reduces the cooldown of Minigun by 8 seconds.

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

4.name: Master Assassin
4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.name: Quarterback
7.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.name: Concussion Grenade
7.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.name: Relentless Soldier
7.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

13.name: Neosteel Coating
13.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

13.name: Spray 'n' Pray
13.description: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Lead Rain
16.description: Overkill also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 30%.

16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
16.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
20.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5.  Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

Tyrael.name: El'druin's Might
Tyrael.description: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. It can be reactivated within 5 seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.

Tyrael.name: Righteousness
Tyrael.description: Shields Tyrael for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for 40% as much for 4 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Smite
Tyrael.description: Rake target area for 150 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Judgment
Tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

Tyrael.name: Sanctification
Tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Archangel's Wrath
Tyrael.description: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

1.name: Salvation
1.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 140 (+4% per level) Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

1.name: Justice for All
1.description: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.name: Ardent Restoration
1.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 18 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

4.name: Stalwart Angel
4.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

4.name: Bound by Law
4.description: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

4.name: Divine Vigor
4.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 60% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 55% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution
7.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Sword of Justice
13.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.name: Holy Ground
13.description: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

16.name: Horadric Reforging
16.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Burning Halo
16.description: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

20.name: Defense of the Angels
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 5 seconds.  Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

20.name: Seal of El'druin
20.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Light of Elune
Tyrande.description: Heal an ally Hero for 255 (+4% per level). Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds every time Tyrande damages an enemy.  Stores up to 2 charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Tyrande.name: Sentinel
Tyrande.description: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for 5 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Lunar Flare
Tyrande.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Shadowstalk
Tyrande.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

Tyrande.name: Starfall
Tyrande.description: Deal 88 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Hunter's Mark
Tyrande.description: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

1.name: Everlasting Light
1.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 45% more.

1.name: Mark of Mending
1.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2.5% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Elune's Chosen
1.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 175% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

4.name: Lunar Blaze
4.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

4.name: Ranger
4.description: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.  Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

4.name: Trueshot Aura
4.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 15% increased Basic Attack damage to other nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.

7.name: Moonlit Arrows
7.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Kaldorei Resistance
7.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

7.name: Huntress' Fury
7.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 88 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ranger's Mark
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Celestial Attunement
16.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

16.name: Empower
16.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Darnassian Archery
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 6 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% Health for 50% more.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Uther.name: Holy Light
Uther.description: Heal target allied Hero for 362 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

Uther.name: Holy Radiance
Uther.description: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for 177 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 177 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

Uther.name: Hammer of Justice
Uther.description: Deal 109 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the target for 1 second.

Uther.name: Divine Shield
Uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

Uther.name: Divine Storm
Uther.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Uther.name: Devotion
Uther.description: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.  Eternal Vanguard  Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

UtherEternalDevotion.name: Flash of Light
UtherEternalDevotion.description: Heal an ally for 230 (+4% per level) Health.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor to 50.

Valeera.name: Sinister Strike
Valeera.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 (+4% per level) damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.

Valeera.name: Blade Flurry
Valeera.description: Deal 130 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera.  Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.  Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.

Valeera.name: Eviscerate
Valeera.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.  1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level)  Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

Valeera.name: Cloak of Shadows
Valeera.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Valeera.name: Smoke Bomb
Valeera.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Valeera.name: Vanish
Valeera.description: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

ValeeraStealth.name: Ambush
ValeeraStealth.description: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

ValeeraStealth.name: Cheap Shot
ValeeraStealth.description: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

ValeeraStealth.name: Garrote
ValeeraStealth.description: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

1.name: Vigor
1.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

13.name: Death From Above
13.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

13.name: Blind
13.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Strangle
13.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate
16.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

16.name: Assassinate
16.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush
20.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

20.name: Enveloping Shadows
20.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.name: Rupture
20.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

20.name: Elusiveness
20.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

Valla.name: Hungering Arrow
Valla.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

Valla.name: Multishot
Valla.description: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

Valla.name: Vault
Valla.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

Valla.name: Strafe
Valla.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Valla.name: Rain of Vengeance
Valla.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Valla.name: Hatred
Valla.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

1.name: Monster Hunter
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

1.name: Caltrops
1.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.name: Punishment
4.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

4.name: Creed of the Hunter
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.name: Arsenal
7.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.name: Repeating Arrow
7.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrow
13.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Frost Shot
16.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.name: Rancor
20.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

Varian.name: Lion's Fang
Varian.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35 (+4% per level), increased to 140 (+4% per level) against Heroes.

Varian.name: Parry
Varian.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Varian.name: Charge
Varian.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

Varian.name: Taunt
Varian.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

Varian.name: Colossus Smash
Varian.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

Varian.name: Twin Blades of Fury
Varian.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

Varian.name: Heroic Strike
Varian.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut
13.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Mortal Strike
13.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shattering Throw
13.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

16.name: Banner of Stormwind
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Ironforge
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Dalaran
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

20.name: Vigilance
20.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

20.name: Master at Arms
20.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy
20.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

20.name: Glory to the Alliance
20.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Demoralizing Shout
20.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Desperate Plea
Whitemane.description: Heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 45

Whitemane.name: Inquisition
Whitemane.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%. Removes a stack of Desperation.  Shares a cooldown with Clemency.

Whitemane.name: Searing Lash
Whitemane.description: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 82 (+4% per level) damage.  If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

Whitemane.name: Scarlet Aegis
