Whitemane.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Divine Reckoning
Whitemane.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

Whitemane.name: Zeal
Whitemane.description: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds. Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.  Activate to gain 25% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Clemency
Whitemane.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds while Channeling. Removes a stack of Desperation  Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.

1.name: Pity the Frail
1.description: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by 1 second. Allies below 30% Health receive 25% more healing from Whitemane.

1.name: Righteous Flame
1.description: Searing Lash deals 25% more damage to enemies. This is increased to 50% against those who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

1.name: Inquisitor's Prayer
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.

4.name: Unwavering Faith
4.description: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 15% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.

4.name: Martyrdom
4.description: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 20%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.

4.name: Indulgence
4.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.

7.name: Zealous Spirit
7.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.name: Scarlet Wrath
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of active Zeal by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Intercession
7.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.name: Scarlet Aegis
10.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

10.name: Divine Reckoning
10.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

13.name: Subjugation
13.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.

13.name: Lashing Out
13.description: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.

13.name: Saintly Greatstaff
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 50 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.

16.name: Radiance
16.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level).

16.name: Shared Punishment
16.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.

16.name: Harsh Discipline
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1 second.

20.name: Judgment Day
20.description: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.name: Guiding Light
20.description: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.

20.name: Purge the Wicked
20.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.

Xul.name: Spectral Scythe
Xul.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

Xul.name: Cursed Strikes
Xul.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

Xul.name: Bone Prison
Xul.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 (+4% per level) damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

Xul.name: Skeletal Mages
Xul.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

Xul.name: Poison Nova
Xul.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

Xul.name: Raise Skeleton
Xul.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 225 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 21 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

Xul.name: Bone Armor
Xul.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Quest: Hit 16 Heroes with Spectral Scythe.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds and its Mana cost by 20.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Weaken
7.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Executioner
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

16.name: Corpse Explosion
16.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

Yrel.name: Vindication
Yrel.description: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96 (+4% per level).  Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140 (+4% per level), and healing up to 320 (+4% per level).

Yrel.name: Righteous Hammer
Yrel.description: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.  Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125 (+4% per level). Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.

Yrel.name: Avenging Wrath
Yrel.description: Leap to a location, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by 50% for 1 second.  Charging up this Ability increases its range.

Yrel.name: Ardent Defender
Yrel.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

Yrel.name: Sacred Ground
Yrel.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

Yrel.name: Divine Purpose
Yrel.description: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.  Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.

1.name: Light of Karabor
1.description: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by 40%. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased to 80%.

1.name: Dauntless
1.description: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 50 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

1.name: Maraad's Insight
1.description: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128 (+4% per level).

4.name: Aegis of Light
4.description: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

4.name: Gift of the Naaru
4.description: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275 (+4% per level).

4.name: Hand of Freedom
4.description: Grant an allied Hero 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.

7.name: Righteous Momentum
7.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Yrel is no longer Slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and instead this bonus is quadrupled.

7.name: Holy Avenger
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

7.name: Divine Steed
7.description: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

10.name: Ardent Defender
10.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

10.name: Sacred Ground
10.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

13.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

13.name: Repentance
13.description: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Velen's Chosen
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Templar's Verdict
16.description: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 6% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Divine Favor
16.description: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Wrath
16.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

20.name: Word of Glory
20.description: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

20.name: Hallowed Ground
20.description: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

20.name: Bubble Hearth
20.description: After 1 second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

20.name: Seraphim
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

Zagara.name: Baneling Barrage
Zagara.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 (+4% per level) damage to enemies it hits.  Stores up to 4 charges.

Zagara.name: Hunter Killer
Zagara.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 71 (+5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

Zagara.name: Infested Drop
Zagara.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 140 (+4% per level) damage.  The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

Zagara.name: Nydus Network
Zagara.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

Zagara.name: Devouring Maw
Zagara.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

Zagara.name: Creep Tumor
Zagara.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.  Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Volatile Acid
1.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

1.name: Corpse Feeders
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

1.name: Infest
1.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

4.name: Envenomed Spines
4.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

4.name: Medusa Blades
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.name: Serrated Spines
4.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

7.name: Baneling Massacre
7.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and they deal 20% more damage.

7.name: Viscous Acid
7.description: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Bile Drop
7.description: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
13.description: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.name: Protective Coating
13.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Brood Expansion
16.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

16.name: Corrosive Saliva
16.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Mutalisk
16.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

Zarya.name: Particle Grenade
Zarya.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges.

Zarya.name: Personal Barrier
Zarya.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

Zarya.name: Shield Ally
Zarya.description: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

Zarya.name: Graviton Surge
Zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

Zarya.name: Expulsion Zone
Zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

Zarya.name: Energy
Zarya.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 9 (+4% per level) damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

1.name: Demolitions Expert
1.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds.  Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

1.name: Together We Are Strong
1.description: Every 5.35 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 40 Energy per Shield.

1.name: Feel the Heat
1.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

1.name: Maximum Charge
1.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.  Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.  Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

4.name: I Am the Strongest
4.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Give Me Twenty
4.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

4.name: Speed Barrier
4.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

4.name: Defensive Shielding
4.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
7.description: Particle Grenade deals 30 (+4% per level) more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

7.name: Explosive Barrier
7.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: To the Limit
7.description: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

7.name: Hit Me
7.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

10.name: Graviton Surge
10.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Expulsion Zone
10.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

13.name: Unstoppable Competitor
13.description: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

13.name: Spell Barrier
13.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

13.name: Endurance Training
13.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

13.name: Pain is Temporary
13.description: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a Shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal Shield active on herself at a time.

16.name: Plasma Shock
16.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

16.name: Cleansing Shield
16.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Gain Train
16.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented Shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

16.name: Born in Battle
16.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

20.name: Gravity Kills
20.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and it Silences Heroes caught in its area.

20.name: Clear Out
20.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's duration by 1.5 seconds and its radius by 15%.

20.name: Grenadier
20.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

20.name: Unyielding Defender
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

Zeratul.name: Cleave
Zeratul.description: Deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Zeratul.name: Singularity Spike
Zeratul.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

Zeratul.name: Blink
Zeratul.description: Teleport to the target location.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Zeratul.name: Might Of The Nerazim
Zeratul.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

Zeratul.name: Void Prison
Zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

Zeratul.name: Permanent Cloak
Zeratul.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

Zeratul.name: Vorpal Blade
Zeratul.description: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Shadow Hunter
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

1.name: Move Unseen
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

4.name: Rending Cleave
4.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Psionic Strength
4.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

4.name: Darkness Descends
4.description: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

7.name: Wormhole
7.description: After 1.25 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within 4 seconds.

7.name: Seeker in the Dark
7.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Warp Skirmisher
7.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal 50% more damage.

10.name: Might Of The Nerazim
10.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

10.name: Void Prison
10.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

13.name: Shroud of Adun
13.description: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 20% of his Maximum Health over 3 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

13.name: Mending Strikes
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Master Warp-Blade
16.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

16.name: Void Slash
16.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Sentenced to Death
16.description: Deal 25% increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.

20.name: Twilight Falls
20.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

20.name: Gift of the Xel'Naga
20.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Shadow Mending
20.description: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

Zuljin.name: Grievous Throw
Zuljin.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

Zuljin.name: Twin Cleave
Zuljin.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

Zuljin.name: Regeneration
Zuljin.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

Zuljin.name: Taz'dingo!
Zuljin.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

Zuljin.name: Guillotine
Zuljin.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

Zuljin.name: Berserker
Zuljin.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

Zuljin.name: Amani Rage
Zuljin.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Hide
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
